citeinfo.title: Longwave Radation Data (J-OFURO)

abstract.p: Japanese Ocean Flux data sets with Use of Remote sensing Observations (J-OFURO)

Data sets are availabe online for download in three file formats: standard ASCII, netCDF, and gzip at http://dtsv.scc.u-tokai.ac.jp/j-ofuro/J-OFURO_LWR.html or anonymous FTP: dtsv.scc.u-tokai.ac.jp/PUB/J-OFURO/LWR/MON.

descript.purpose: To derive homogenous data with high resolution using analysis and satellite data for obtaining globally-covered fluxes between ocean and atmosphere.
